TopicTitle: I'm looking for new solar panel parts

Articles.Content:
Hello!

I've been looking quite a while for bigger solar panel arrays with no luck so far... so... do you know good mods that adds more kinds and sizes for solar panels?

Thanks!

Kosmos has some huge panels: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kosmos-tks-spacecraft/

I believe this one has different sizes, too: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-18-ion-engine-pack/
AIES has some nice mid-sized panels, in between the Gigantor and the stock small panels.

Dear Deses, you are looking for solar panels parts . I want to know that what types of parts you want spring channel nuts, stainless steel channel nuts,foundation bolt, anchor bolt, strut brackets, fabricated steel products, cantilever arms, strut channel, solar mounting hooks, mounting structure for solar modules, industrial fasteners, swivel hanger, channel pipe clamps, lined and unlined pipe clamps ? Then I can Help you

Solar panel systems offer a whole lot more besides just lighting the house. These solar panels may add warmth to your home through the cooler a few months of the year. Solar power panels could eventually purchase themsleves. It might even eradicate it.

Remember that solar panel systems aren't just meant for the roofing. If you don't desire them on the roof, you can put solar panels in your yard. When possible, pick variable brackets and purchase a sun monitor so that your sections can always be located at the right angle. You must consider the decline of backyard room, however.

If you have kids in the home, your energy expenses is probably extremely high. Kids typically overlook to make off of or disconnect not necessary items which can greatly affect your energy costs. Once people have used far better behavior, you should consider changing to solar power to lessen your regular bills.

Welcome to the Kerbal Space Program community forums joannshelby

I think you have misunderstood the purpose of this thread though, the panels the OP seeks are just addon parts for a computer game, not real solar panels
